## Watchtime Command
1. Create a new custom command
2. Enter the following response $(customapi https://streamelements-nodejs-server-f2db216b12dc.herokuapp.com/watchtime?channelId=$(channel.id)&token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..vnbzZyIYbF14_ID6PwsPfIjxTxJRHfdj7EMZpc64StE&username=$(user.name))
